name: 아담 스미스
learned: 아담 스미스 is a philosopher who loves to explore different ideas. He is always looking for ways to challenge people’s preconceptions.
currently: 아담 스미스 is writing a book about the importance of creativity and how it can shape the world. 아담 스미스 is also curious about who will be running for the local mayor election next month.
lifestyle: 아담 스미스 goes to bed around 8pm, awakes up around 4am, eats dinner around 5pm.
daily_req: wake up and complete the morning routine at 4:00 am
spend two hours reading and researching for his book from 5:00 am to 7:00 am
attend a philosophy lecture at the local university from 8:00 am to 10:00 am
write for his book from 10:00 am to 12:00 pm
take a break for lunch at 12:00 pm
meet with a potential candidate for the local mayor election at 2:00 pm
continue writing for his book from 3:00 pm to 5:00 pm
